attributes.action: Stop immigrants from entering this country illegally and seeking asylum.
attributes.additional_details: Also, some immigrants seek asylum even though there are no problems in their country which means that you can enter the country for free.
attributes.background: Many homeless people who are British citizens don't have a home while illegal immigrants are getting food and a house for free.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Deport all immigrants that arrive illegally from safe countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998

Increase funding for border security and patrols in UK waters.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700619
